g.text: -dG and rG binding to purine family riboswitches
L2-L3 interactions in the purine riboswitch family. (
) Map of long-range interactions between L2 and L3 in the
aptamer domain. Notation is that of Leontis and Westhof (
) Stereoscopic image of long-range interactions between L2 and L3 in the
-dG-I riboswitch aptamer domain. Dashed lines represent single hydrogen bonding interactions. (
) Wall-eyed stereo view of the alignment of the L2-L3
aptamer domain (blue). R.m.s. deviation between the substructures is 0.50
